name: R5-NamingSystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingSystemIdentifierType
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 NamingSystemIdentifierType into FHIR R4

element.display: An IRI string that can be prepended to the code to obtain a concept IRI for RDF applications. This should be a valid, absolute IRI as defined in RFC 3987. See rdf.html#iri-stem for details on how this value may be used.
Some other type of unique identifier; e.g. HL7-assigned reserved string such as LN for LOINC.

target.display: Some other type of unique identifier; e.g. HL7-assigned reserved string such as LN for LOINC.

element.display: A uniform resource identifier (ideally a URL - uniform resource locator); e.g. http://unitsofmeasure.org.

target.display: A uniform resource identifier (ideally a URL - uniform resource locator); e.g. http://unitsofmeasure.org.

element.display: A universally unique identifier of the form a5afddf4-e880-459b-876e-e4591b0acc11.

target.display: A universally unique identifier of the form a5afddf4-e880-459b-876e-e4591b0acc11.

element.display: A short string published by HL7 for use in the V2 family of standsrds to idenfify a code system in the V12 coded data types CWE, CNE, and CF. The code values are also published by HL7 at http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/vocab/table_0396/index.cfm
